message.content:
Fix CEP manifest Host Version and align version numbers.

**Tasks:**
1. Change Host Version from "15.0" to "14.0" in `splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml`
2. Update ExtensionBundleVersion to "6.0.2" in manifest.xml
3. Update Extension Version to "6.0.2" in manifest.xml
4. Update SPLICE_VERSION to "6.0.2" in `splice-cep/panel/js/config.js`
5. Update SPLICE_VERSION to "6.0.2" in `splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx` if present

**Cycle:**
1. Make all version changes
2. Run: `node splice-backend/tests/comprehensive-e2e.test.js`
3. Verify manifest XML is valid
4. If fails, fix and retest

Key files:
- `splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml`
- `splice-cep/panel/js/config.js`
- `splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx`

Report: All changes made and test status.

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="1.0.0"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="1.0.0"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="15.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

todos.content: Update Host Version from 15.0 to 14.0 in manifest.xml
Update Extension Version to 6.0.2 in manifest.xml

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

newTodos.content: Update Host Version from 15.0 to 14.0 in manifest.xml
Update Extension Version to 6.0.2 in manifest.xml

content.text: Now I will make all the version changes:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="1.0.0"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="1.0.0"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="15.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.2"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.2"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="14.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.text:
## Summary

All version changes have been completed successfully:

### Changes Made

| File | Change | Value |
|------|--------|-------|
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml` | Host Version | `15.0` -> `14.0` |
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml` | ExtensionBundleVersion | `1.0.0` -> `6.0.2` |
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml` | Extension Version | `1.0.0` -> `6.0.2` |
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/js/config.js` | SPLICE_CONFIG.VERSION | `'4.0.0'` -> `'6.0.2'` |
| `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx` | SPLICE_VERSION | `"4.0.0"` -> `"6.0.2"` |

### Test Status

- **Manifest XML validation**: PASSED (valid XML)
- **Comprehensive E2E test**: 40/57 passed
  - All 17 failures are due to server not running (`connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:3847`)
  - All offline tests passed (cut list generator, bleep audio, presets, profanity detection, edge cases, integration tests, performance benchmarks)

### Key Version Alignment

All version numbers are now aligned to **6.0.2**:
- CEP manifest: ExtensionBundleVersion = `6.0.2`
- CEP manifest: Extension Version = `6.0.2`
- JavaScript config: SPLICE_CONFIG.VERSION = `'6.0.2'`
- ExtendScript host: SPLICE_VERSION = `"6.0.2"`

The Host Version is set to `14.0` for wider Premiere Pro compatibility (14.0-25.9).
